name: R city
description: R CITY is one of the largest retail malls in Mumbai which is strategically located in the central suburb of Mumbai-Ghatkopar on LBS road.
location: LBS Rd, Amrut Nagar, Ghatkopar West, Mumbai â€“ 400086
additionalDetails: Catering to Food, Fashion, and Entertainment, it features 500+ premium brands like Lifestyle, H&M, Super Dry, and a luxury 9-screen INOX multiplex. With 14 Anchor stores, 10+ mini-anchors, 220+ stores, 65+ F&B outlets, and 12+ family entertainment brands.

images.name: Urban tadka
images.description: Cuisine: North Indian, Mughlai, Kebab, Biryani, Beverages, Finger Food

categories.name: Restaurant
categories.description: Savor exquisite flavors at R City Mall's diverse restaurants, offering a culinary journey that caters to every palate.

subCategories.name: Fast food
subCategories.description: Indulge in quick and delicious bites at R City Mall's fast-food joints, offering a tempting array of flavors for those on the go.
subCategories.additionalDetails: From iconic classics to trendy treats, satisfy your cravings with a speedy and satisfying dining experience.

categories.additionalDetails: From fine dining to casual eats, enjoy a delightful gastronomic experience amidst the vibrant ambiance of the mall.

coupons.name: Games & more
coupons.description: 10 Video Games + 10 Ticket Games + 3 Prize Games + 1 Attraction activity
coupons.additionalDetails:
Open the voucher on your phone - via email or under the 'purchases' section of the app
Show the voucher to the merchant when you visit
The merchant will verify the voucher and redeem it on your app
30 days of purchase

shops.name: Urban tadka
shops.description: Cuisine: North Indian, Mughlai, Kebab, Biryani, Beverages, Finger Food

categories.name: Kidzania
categories.additionalDetails: KidZania in R City Mall, Ghatkopar, Mumbai, is an interactive educational entertainment center where children can engage in role-playing activities to learn about various professions in a mini-city setting.

parkings.additionalDetails: R City mall is quite big. It has 2 parking areas, one is underground & other is above. Either of one is open at one time.

events.name: Christmas
events.description: Experience the enchantment of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive cheer comes alive with dazzling decorations, joyful carols, and a magical atmosphere that welcomes families to create lasting holiday memories.
events.additionalDetails: Celebrate the magic of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive decorations, joyful carols, and a warm, enchanting atmosphere create a magical holiday experience for shoppers and families. Indulge in the spirit of giving and discover delightful surprises around every corner as the mall transforms into a winter wonderland during this joyous season.

otherAttractions.name: Christmas
otherAttractions.description: Experience the enchantment of Christmas at R City Mall, Ghatkopar, where festive cheer comes alive with dazzling decorations, joyful carols, and a magical atmosphere that welcomes families to create lasting holiday memories.
